roleset.name: to represent by a diagram
roleset.note: DIAGRAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'diagram' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from diagram.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Once inside , she-2 spends nearly four hours [*-2] measuring and diagramming each room in the 80-year-old house , [*-2]gathering enough information [*] to estimate what it [*EXP*-3] would cost [*T*-1] [*] to rebuild it .
